title: Crystal Salt Stone Aromatherapy Oil Diffuser
description: Features: 1. USB power supply, plug in use. 2. Essential oil fragrance diffuse. 3. Release negative ions to purify air. 4. Aromatherapy soothe sleep, relieve stress. 5. Nano fine spray, get rid of dryness. 6. PP anti-corrosion material, non-toxic and odorless. Parameters: Capacity: 150m L Power: 4w Voltage: DC 5V Size:
cleaned_text: power supply, plug in use. 2. Essential oil fragrance diffuse. 3. Release negative ions to purify air. 4. Aromatherapy soothe sleep, relieve stress. 5. Nano fine spray, get rid of dryness. 6. PP anti-corrosion Mist button: Click the mist button firstly to turn on continuous spray. Click secondly to switch to intermittent spray. Click thirdly to turn off the spray. Light button: Click the light button to turn on the colorful charging light. Click secondly to set the current light color, click thirdly to turn off the light.
